Room.Name: Lorian Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Lorian Parkway, between the Temple of Clerical Science, located on the west side of the road, and Pandora's Apothecary on the east side.
Room.LongDescription: Pandora carries all kinds of interesting and useful items for the novice mage and even a few items for the general public. Potions and spells are her specialty. On the west side of the road is the Temple of Clerical Science, where modern science meets the clerical hierarcy in an explosive combination of technology and religion.
